#summary How to install a newer preset file
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Design

= Linux =

For a user unzip and copy presets.xml to /home/user/.winff
For the system unzip and copy presets.xml to /usr/share/winff

if you install to the system each user must delete /home/user/.winff/presets.xml

= Windows =

For a user unzip and copy presets.xml to c:\documents and settings\application data\winff
For the system unzip and copy presets.xml c:\program files\winff

if you install to the system each user must c:\documents and settings\application data\winff
